pages.text: With this update comes new entities. Some will open new doors while others will challenge you in the night.

pages.name: Ducks
pages.text: Ducks are the new passive mob in our update. Play a juke box near them to watch them jam.

pages.name: Decaying Zombie
pages.text: These zombies are fast, but with less hit points. Be careful when they approach.

pages.name: Troll
pages.text: Trolls are special mobs only found when specifically spawned.

pages.name: Christmas Tree
pages.text: Christmas trees are not new, but they look nice in the winter.
